episodes.title: The Cult Playbook: Kevin Wesley vs. Jim Jones & Nature Boy
episodes.description:
Tonight, we’re breaking down the eerie similarities between Kevin Wesley’s “tribe” recruitment strategy and two of the most infamous cult leaders in history — Jim Jones and Nature Boy.
From emotional manipulation and isolation tactics to pay-to-play spiritual access, this livestream dissects how modern-day influencers repackage old cult strategies to lure vulnerable followers.
🚩 The criteria.
🚩 The “legacy building.”
🚩 The “awakened only” mindset.
🚩 The relocation movement.
It’s all in The Cult Playbook — and tonight, we’re comparing the scripts side-by-side.
🕖 Set your reminder. 7PM CST.
📌 Bring your critical thinking.
🎥 Receipts will be shown.
💬 Comment. Like. Share. Let’s talk about it LOUD.

#KevinWesley #JimJones #NatureBoy #CultTactics #SpiritualManipulation #TribeRecruitment #TheCultPlaybook #ExposingCults #EmotionalManipulation #ModernCults
